/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/umtrx_pa_ctrl.dir/umtrx_pa_ctrl.cpp.o  -o umtrx_pa_ctrl   -L/usr/local/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib: /usr/local/lib/libuhd.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_date_time.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_filesystem.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_system.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_thread.so -lpthread /usr/local/lib/libboost_program_options.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_chrono.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_atomic.so -lpthread /usr/local/lib/libboost_program_options.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_chrono.so /usr/local/lib/libboost_atomic.so
